text: Jericho is a hamlet and census-designated place (CDP) in the Town of Oyster Bay in Nassau County, on the North Shore of Long Island, in New York, United States. It is about 29 miles (47 km) east of Manhattan. The population was 14,808 at the time of the 2020 census. ==References== Category:Hamlets in New York (state) Category:Census-designated places in New York (state)
title: Jericho, New York
